verses.verse: Call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> if there <S%H3426>be<s%> any that will <S%H6030>answer<s%> thee; and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H4310>which<s%> of the <S%H4480>saints<s%> <S%H6918><s%> wilt thou <S%H6437>turn?<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3708>wrath<s%> <S%H2026>killeth<s%> the <S%H191>foolish<s%> man, and <S%H7068>envy<s%> <S%H4191>slayeth<s%> the <S%H6601>silly<s%> one.
I <S%H589><s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H191>foolish<s%> taking <S%H8327>root:<s%> but <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> I <S%H5344>cursed<s%> his <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>

His <S%H1121>children<s%> are <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H4480>safety,<s%> <S%H3468><s%> and they are <S%H1792>crushed<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them.

Whose <S%H834><s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%> the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> eateth <S%H398>up,<s%> and <S%H3947>taketh<s%> it even out <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H4480>thorns,<s%> <S%H6791><s%> and the <S%H6782>robber<s%> swalloweth <S%H7602>up<s%> their <S%H2428>substance.<s%>

Although <S%H3588><s%> <S%H205>affliction<s%> cometh not <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of the <S%H4480>dust,<s%> <S%H6083><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> doth <S%H5999>trouble<s%> <S%H6779>spring<s%> out of the <S%H4480>ground;<s%> <S%H127><s%>
Yet <S%H3588><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> unto <S%H5999>trouble,<s%> as the <S%H1121>sparks<s%> <S%H7565><s%> <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H1361>upward.<s%>
I <S%H589><s%> would <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> would I <S%H7760>commit<s%> my cause: <S%H1700><s%>
Which <S%H6213>doeth<s%> great <S%H1419>things<s%> and <S%H369>unsearchable;<s%> <S%H2714><s%> marvelous <S%H6381>things<s%> <S%H5704>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> number: <S%H4557><s%>
Who <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7971>sendeth<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the fields: <S%H2351><s%>
To set <S%H7760>up<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%> those that be <S%H8217>low;<s%> that those which <S%H6937>mourn<s%> may be <S%H7682>exalted<s%> to <S%H3468>safety.<s%>
He <S%H6565>disappointeth<s%> the <S%H4284>devices<s%> of the <S%H6175>crafty,<s%> so that their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6213>perform<s%> their <S%H8454>enterprise.<s%>
He <S%H3920>taketh<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> in their own <S%H6193>craftiness:<s%> and the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H6617>froward<s%> is carried <S%H4116>headlong.<s%>
They <S%H6298>meet<s%> with <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime,<s%> and <S%H4959>grope<s%> in the <S%H6672>noonday<s%> as in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

But he <S%H3467>saveth<s%> the <S%H34>poor<s%> from the <S%H4480>sword,<s%> <S%H2719><s%> from their <S%H4480>mouth,<s%> <S%H6310><s%> and from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H2389>mighty.<s%>
So the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H1961>hath<s%> <S%H8615>hope,<s%> and <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> <S%H7092>stoppeth<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H835>happy<s%> is the <S%H582>man<s%> whom <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H3198>correcteth:<s%> therefore <S%H3988>despise<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou the <S%H4148>chastening<s%> of the Almighty: <S%H7706><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> maketh <S%H3510>sore,<s%> and bindeth <S%H2280>up:<s%> he <S%H4272>woundeth,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> make <S%H7495>whole.<s%>
He shall <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H6869>troubles:<s%> yea, in <S%H7651>seven<s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> thee.
In <S%H7458>famine<s%> he shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> thee from <S%H4480>death:<s%> <S%H4194><s%> and in <S%H4421>war<s%> from the <S%H4480>power<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

Thou shalt be <S%H2244>hid<s%> from the <S%H7752>scourge<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H4480>destruction<s%> <S%H7701><s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H935>cometh.<s%>

At <S%H7701>destruction<s%> and <S%H3720>famine<s%> thou shalt <S%H7832>laugh:<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> shalt thou be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H4480>beasts<s%> <S%H2416><s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt be in <S%H1285>league<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be at <S%H7999>peace<s%> with thee.

And thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that thy <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> shall be in <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H6485>visit<s%> thy <S%H5116>habitation,<s%> and shalt not <S%H3808>sin.<s%> <S%H2398><s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> also <S%H3588>that<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H7227>great,<s%> and thine <S%H6631>offspring<s%> as the <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thy <S%H6913>grave<s%> in a full <S%H3624>age,<s%> like as a shock of <S%H1430>corn<s%> cometh <S%H5927>in<s%> in his <S%H6256>season.<s%>
Lo <S%H2009><s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> we have <S%H2713>searched<s%> it, <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is; <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, and <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> it for thy good.
